def attach_policy(user_name, policy_arn): """ Attaches a policy to a user.
:param user_name: The name of the user. :param policy_arn: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the policy. """ try: iam.User(user_name).attach_policy(PolicyArn=policy_arn) logger.info("Attached policy %s to user %s.", policy_arn, user_name) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't attach policy %s to user %s.", policy_arn, user_name) raise
